subject: News Sources, Confidential Status of
Baseball
News and News Media
lead_paragraph: Chris Cotillo is only a high school senior, but after breaking several national baseball stories in recent weeks, he was clearly a source of intrigue among the people who work in baseball.
snippet: Chris Cotillo is only a high school senior, but after breaking several national baseball stories in recent weeks, he was clearly a source of intrigue among the people who work in baseball.
